lyrics.ja: 主人に伝えます
バターがこぼれたことを

lyrics.original: E a manteiga não é minha
lyrics.ja: そのバターは私のものではありません

lyrics.original: E a manteiga é de ioiô
lyrics.ja: そのバターはイオヨのものです
ああ はい はい はい
ああ いいえ いいえ いいえ

lyrics.en: Today we have, but tomorrow no
lyrics.ja: 今日はあるけど明日はない

lyrics.en: Today we have, but tomorrow no
lyrics.ja: 今日はあるけど明日はない

title: Agora Sim Quem Mataram Meu Besouro

lyrics.original: Agora sim, que mataram o meu Besouro
lyrics.en: Now yes, they have killed my Besouro
lyrics.ko: 이제 정말, 그들이 내 비소우루를 죽였네
lyrics.ja: 今そう、彼らは私のベソウロを殺しました

lyrics.original: Depois de morto, Besourinho cordão de ouro
lyrics.en: After death, little Besouro with a golden cord
lyrics.ko: 죽은 후에, 황금 끈을 가진 작은 비소우루
lyrics.ja: 死後、小さなベソウロは金の紐を持っています
ベソウロ、小さなベソウロ
金の紐
ベムテヴィが飛んだ、飛んだ
飛ばせて
ラ ラウエ ラウエ ラウエ ラウア

lyrics.original: Que som, o que arte é essa
lyrics.en: What sound, what art is this
lyrics.ja: この音、この芸術は何ですか
戦いと遊びの

lyrics.en: What a wonderful roda is this
lyrics.ja: なんて素晴らしいホーダだ
これはアシェ カポエイラです

lyrics.original: Em cada som, em cada toque
lyrics.en: In each sound, in each beat
lyrics.ja: 各音、各ビートで

lyrics.original: Em cada ginga, tem um estilo de jogo
lyrics.en: In each ginga, there is a style of play
lyrics.ko: 각 진가마다, 하나의 게임 스타일이 있네
lyrics.ja: 各ジンガに、それぞれのスタイルがあります
ラウエ ラウエ ラ...
誰が来るの？それは私だ
ベリンバウが鳴った
私はカポエイラだ
遠くから来ました
バイアから来ました
私はカポエイラをします
でもそれは私、それは私だ
馬に乗って
葉巻を吸いながら
カンボアタのマリアさん

lyrics.original: Ela chega na venda ela manda botar
lyrics.en: She arrives at the market and starts giving orders
lyrics.ko: 그녀는 시장에 도착해 명령을 내리기 시작한다
lyrics.ja: 彼女は市場に到着し、命令を出し始めます
カンボアタのマリアさん

lyrics.original: Ela chega na venda e dá salto mortal
lyrics.en: She arrives at the market and does a backflip
lyrics.ja: 彼女は市場に到着してバックフリップをします
カンボアタのマリアさん

lyrics.original: Ela chega na venda e começa a gingar
lyrics.en: She arrives at the market and starts to ginga
lyrics.ja: 彼女は市場に到着してジンガを始めます
カンボアタのマリアさん

lyrics.original: Ela chama o menino e manda comprar
lyrics.en: She calls the boy and sends him to buy
lyrics.ko: 그녀는 소년을 불러 물건을 사오게 한다
lyrics.ja: 彼女は少年を呼んで買い物に行かせます
カンボアタのマリアさん

lyrics.original: Se não tem, se não acha ela manda trocar
lyrics.en: If it's not there, if he doesn't find it, she demands an exchange
lyrics.ko: 없으면, 찾지 못하면 그녀는 교환을 요구한다
lyrics.ja: なければ、見つからなければ交換を要求します
カンボアタのマリアさん

lyrics.original: É do Camboatá, é do Camboatá
lyrics.ja: 彼女はカンボアタ出身です、カンボアタ出身です

lyrics.original: Sou capoeira, olha eu sei que sou
lyrics.en: I'm capoeira, look I know I am
lyrics.ja: 私はカポエイラだ、見て、私は知っている

lyrics.original: Eu vim aqui foi para jogar
lyrics.ja: 私はここに遊びに来た

lyrics.original: Faço bonito só porque tenho talento
lyrics.en: I make it beautiful just because I have talent
lyrics.ja: 才能があるから美しく作る

lyrics.en: And let go of my moves
lyrics.ja: そして自分の動きを解き放つ

lyrics.en: With a voice in the heart
lyrics.ja: 心の中の声とともに

lyrics.original: Que amor é esse que trago no coração
lyrics.en: What is this love that I carry in my heart?
lyrics.ko: 내 마음에 담긴 이 사랑은 무엇인가?
lyrics.ja: 私の心にあるこの愛は何ですか？

lyrics.original: Uma alegria, uma vontade de gingar
lyrics.en: A joy, a desire to ginga
lyrics.ja: 喜び、ジンガへの渇望
サンベントグランデ、イウナ、カバラリア

lyrics.en: When it plays, I get goosebumps
lyrics.ja: 演奏されると鳥肌が立つ

lyrics.en: Today is the day to play
lyrics.ja: 今日は遊ぶ日だ

lyrics.original: E o cantador solta a voz
lyrics.en: And the singer lets his voice loose
lyrics.ja: 歌手が声を解き放つ
人々が聞けるように

lyrics.original: Berimbau, viola, arma a roda e
lyrics.en: Berimbau, viola, set the roda and
lyrics.ja: ベリンバウ、ビオラ、ホーダを準備して
音をマークする

lyrics.original: A meia lua é ligeira e corta o vento
lyrics.en: The meia lua is swift and cuts the wind
lyrics.ja: メイアルアは速く、風を切る
カポエイラは内側で遊ぶ
私の師匠が教えてくれたように

lyrics.original: E o capoeira é astuto e velhaco
lyrics.en: And the capoeirista is cunning and sly
lyrics.ja: カポエイリスタは狡猾でずる賢い

lyrics.original: É inimigo do perigo e confusão
lyrics.en: He is the enemy of danger and confusion
lyrics.ja: 彼は危険と混乱の敵だ

lyrics.original: Mas ele sabe o valor de uma vida
lyrics.en: But he knows the value of a life
lyrics.ja: しかし彼は命の価値を知っている
だから彼は喧嘩を避ける
そして遊ぶことを好む

lyrics.original: A hora é essa, a hora é essa
lyrics.en: The time is now, the time is now
lyrics.ko: 지금이 바로 그 시간이다, 지금이 바로 그 시간이다
lyrics.ja: 今がその時だ、今がその時だ
カポエイラでベリンバウが演奏された

lyrics.en: The berimbau played, I'm going to play
lyrics.ja: ベリンバウが演奏された、私は遊びに行く
行け、行け
ドナ・マリア、元気ですか？

lyrics.original: Joga bonito que eu quero aprender
lyrics.en: Play beautifully because I want to learn
lyrics.ja: 美しくプレイしてください、学びたいです
ドナ・マリア、元気ですか？
行け、元気ですか
ドナ・マリア、元気ですか？

lyrics.original: Joga bonito que eu quero ver
lyrics.en: Play beautifully because I want to see
lyrics.ja: 美しくプレイしてください、見たいです
ドナ・マリア、元気ですか？

lyrics.original: Como vai você, como vai você
lyrics.en: How are you, how are you
lyrics.ja: 元気ですか、元気ですか
ドナ・マリア、元気ですか？

lyrics.original: Joga bonito que o mestre quer ver
lyrics.en: Play beautifully because the master wants to see
lyrics.ja: 美しくプレイしてください、マスターが見たいです
ドナ・マリア、元気ですか？
カポエイラは空手ではありません
ドナ・マリア、元気ですか？

lyrics.en: Play beautifully so I can learn
lyrics.ko: 아름답게 플레이해줘요, 제가 배울 수 있게
lyrics.ja: 美しくプレイしてください、学べるように
ドナ・マリア、元気ですか？

lyrics.original: Foi na Bahia que eu mandei fazer
lyrics.en: It was in Bahia that I had made
lyrics.ja: バイーアで作らせた

lyrics.original: Foi na Bahia que eu mandei preparar
lyrics.en: It was in Bahia that I had prepared
lyrics.ja: バイーアで準備させた

lyrics.original: Meu patuá meu pai, meu patuá
lyrics.en: My amulet, my father, my amulet
lyrics.ko: 내 부적, 내 아버지, 내 부적
lyrics.ja: 私のお守り、私の父、私のお守り
私を守るためのお守り

lyrics.original: Era domingo, era um dia de oferendas
lyrics.en: It was Sunday, it was a day of offerings
lyrics.ja: 日曜日、捧げ物の日だった

lyrics.original: E eu levei flores pra Iemanjá
lyrics.en: And I took flowers to Iemanjá
lyrics.ja: そしてイエマンジャに花を持っていった

lyrics.en: I went to celebrate Janaína, young queen
lyrics.ja: 若き女王ジャナイナを祝うために行った

lyrics.original: Iemanjá que é a dona do mar
lyrics.en: Iemanjá who is the owner of the sea
lyrics.ja: 海の主イエマンジャ

lyrics.original: E na Bahia um mestre velho mandingueiro
lyrics.en: And in Bahia, an old cunning master
lyrics.ja: バイーアでの老練な師匠

lyrics.original: Abriu a roda fazendo uma louvação
lyrics.en: Opened the roda making a praise
lyrics.ja: 称賛を込めてロダを開いた
非常に強く嘆きの歌を歌った
私に祝福を与えながら

lyrics.original: Era a hora de eu sair pra jogar
lyrics.en: It was time for me to go out to play
lyrics.ja: 遊びに出る時間だった

lyrics.original: Fui convidado pra uma roda de gigante
lyrics.en: I was invited to a giant roda
lyrics.ja: 巨大なロダに招待された

lyrics.original: Com dois pandeiros e três berimbaus
lyrics.en: With two pandeiros and three berimbaus
lyrics.ko: 두 개의 판데이루와 세 개의 베림바우와 함께
lyrics.ja: 2つのパンデイロと3つのベリンバウとともに

lyrics.original: E um atabaque tocando maneiro e sereno
lyrics.en: And an atabaque playing smoothly and serenely
lyrics.ja: 滑らかで穏やかに演奏するアタバキとともに

lyrics.original: É a roda que já vai começar
lyrics.en: It's the roda that's about to start
lyrics.ja: もうすぐ始まるロダ

lyrics.original: Meu patuá é meu berimbau sagrado
lyrics.en: My amulet is my sacred berimbau
lyrics.ja: 私のお守りは神聖なベリンバウ

lyrics.original: É minha vida e também o meu cantar
lyrics.en: It's my life and also my singing
lyrics.ja: それは私の人生であり、私の歌でもある
微笑む私の友達

lyrics.original: Sempre junto comigo, na volta que o mundo dá
lyrics.en: Always with me, in the turn that the world takes
lyrics.ko: 세상이 도는 동안 항상 나와 함께
lyrics.ja: 世界が回る間、常に私とともに
出ておいで、出ておいで、カタリナ

lyrics.original: Saia do mar, venha ver Idalina
lyrics.en: Get out of the sea, come see Idalina
lyrics.ja: 海から出て、イダリナを見に来て
出ておいで、出ておいで、カタリナ

lyrics.original: Saia do mar, venha ver, venha ver
lyrics.en: Get out of the sea, come see, come see
lyrics.ko: 바다에서 나와, 보러 와, 보러 와
lyrics.ja: 海から出て、見に来て、見に来て
出ておいで、出ておいで、カタリナ
ああ、カタリナ、私の愛
出ておいで、出ておいで、カタリナ

lyrics.original: Saia do mar, saia do mar
lyrics.en: Get out of the sea, get out of the sea
lyrics.ja: 海から出て、海から出て
